p: For the aggregated data, increases in N l correlated linearly with increases in the percentage of polymorphic alleles (P pl) and population genetic diversity (I) ( R 2 = 0.97, P < 0.013 and R 2 = 0.96, P < 0.016, respectively). There was a strong linear relationship between I and P pl ( R 2 = 0.99, P < 0.001).
